description: Research® plus 8-Channel Adjustable Pipette, 30-300 µL, Eppendorf is one of the most commonly used multi-channel mechanical pipettes in the world. This is an innovative liquid handling product as well as one of the safest and most ergonomic pipettes available today. It is an ultra light, fully autoclavable pipette with a spring loaded tip cone, a secondary calibration option, an improved volume display. The designs of spring-loaded tip cone for reliable tip fit and low tip attachment forces greatly save your energy and time. This Research plus mechanical pipette has been accoladed with the Bronze "Seal of Quality". Spring-loaded tip cone for reliable tip fit and low tip attachment forces save your energy and time.The Research plus microliter pipette has been developed within the strict criteria which stands for intuitive operation, a perfect balance and minimal operator strain and fatigue.
name: Research plus 8-Channel Adjustable Pipette
